title: HELP CANT OPEN OPTIONS MENU
body: One day i changed the options menu button to none and now i cant open it i tried the input folder in config iv'e even tried 3rd party apps at this point imma uninstall and reinstall plz help how do i go back to default

replies.body:
Should be able to help you out with this!  Here's what you need to do:

1. Make sure you are signed into League and are on the Client
2. Open your installation of League:  C:/Riot Games --> League of Legends --> Config
3. Find the files game.cfg and persistedsettings.json and delete them.

Once you start a new game, everything will be set to default.  Let me know if this doesn't help at all!
